entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpAddMissingImportsRefactoringProvider depends on EditorFeature service #66157
  • how can I use assembly as analyzer? #66153
  • Side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are not preserved in generic code #66152

Closed

  • OverflowOnFluentCall is flaky #65910
    17.5 P3
  • AspNetCore.Mvc.Consumes attribute triggers CA1825 #66150
  • Conditional null access produces weird error for nullable value types #66143

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66154
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix Extract Base When Class Has Base #66149
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Reduce amount of stack used by CodeGenerator.EmitInstanceCallExpression #66137
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Only examine a PEReference once when walking projects to produce inheritance tree #66043
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66148
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Correct initial state for nested method nullability analysis #66147
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.5
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #66145
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
